city.name: Philadelphia
city.description: Philadelphia is the largest city in the state of Pennsylvania, Its name means brotherly love.sitting alongside the Delaware River.

favouriteSubjects.name: Law of contract
favouriteSubjects.description: Contract law provides a legal framework within which persons can transact business and exchange resources, secure in the knowledge that the law will uphold their agreements and, if necessary, enforce them

favouriteSubjects.name: Law of Evidence
favouriteSubjects.description: rules and legal principles that govern the proof of facts in a legal proceeding.

favouriteSubjects.name: Law of persons
favouriteSubjects.description: Law of persons is that part of private law that determines which entities have legal rights and capacities
